name: Big Crunch
description:
Space is collapsing into itself! Try to escape as long as you can before getting swallowed up!

Move with WASD or Arrow key

Press Enter to start

Used Programs

- Unity 2018.2
- Photoshop
- Magica Voxel(for models)
- Audacity
- BeepBox(for music)
- Chiptone(for sound fx)

This game is made for #LDJAM42
